name: Baruch Spinoza
notable_ideas: ''Conatus'', Multitude, ''Sub specie aeternitatis'', ''Causa sui'', ''Deus sive Natura''
influences: Franciscus van den Enden, Christiaan Huygens, René Descartes
influenced: Leibniz, Gotthold Ephraim Lessing, Novalis, Goethe, Shelley, Hegel, Schopenhauer, Marx, Hess, G. Eliot, Santayana, Einstein, Wittgenstein, Borges, Deleuze, Althusser, L. Strauss
